About.paragraph: VisionDrop AI is a QA/QC company, we innovate affordable kits for home testing that deliver lab accurate results. We are dedicated to empowering individuals to take quality control into their own hands. With our core technologies, microfluidics and smartphone apps, a smartphone can become a personal laboratory.

Products.paragraph: We are developing a drinking water home lab kit.

Features.title: Chemistry
Features.text: Color changing reactions indicate presence of pollutants.

Features.title: Microfluidics
Features.text: Miniscule channels and chambers enable multiplexing of tests.

Features.title: Smartphone App
Features.text: AI-powered App turns your smartphone into a personal laboratory.

Features.title: Deep Learning
Features.text: Language model designed for quantitative analysis to condense report data
